overview: Mara, Iosif's young wife, dies. Struggling to accept her death, Iosif hopes to find solace in the first November snow. In the hollow of an old oak, he finds Mara's last gift: a magical music box where her songs live. When Iosif wants to listen to the enthralling sounds, he swings the windows wide open. But one day someone steals the wondrous box...
title: Shirey Mara
